item.description:
We know this is last minute, but it's TOO GOOD to pass up. Enigma Salsa & Bachata Lounge is hosting a once a month band now, and they are a surefire night of great energy. Join us for lessons, drinks, appetizers, new friends, dancing, and LIVE MUSIC by Jeremy de Jesus & E.S.M. this Friday. Bryn will be hosting this exciting night of music and dance right in Harvard Square. Hope to see you Friday!!

----

Join us at one of Boston's Friday Salsa hotspots, complete with a separate Bachata lounge. They will be featuring a LIVE BAND this Friday: Jeremy de Jesus & E.S.M., so will be an exciting night of music and dance!

Make new friends and dance till 2am in the new exclusive club room at Fire + Ice in Harvard Square. Complete with club lighting, air conditioning, high end speakers embedded throughout the room, and not one, but two specially installed wood floors just for dancers. Enigma Club is the only latin club featuring two rooms: a salsa main room opening at 9:30pm for lessons and dancing, and the NEW Bachata Lounge, opening at 11:45pm (or earlier if available). Your salsa and bachata soul will thank you. Not to mention two swank bars (with reasonably priced drinks), super friendly wait staff, and even appetizers available from the kitchen in case you get hungry.

 

Cover: $15 for the live music event includes:

  • Salsa/Bachata/Merengue Lessons @ 9:30pm (lessons change weekly)
  • Social dancing till 2am
  • Air Conditioned club room
  • Music by DJ D. Martinez, DJ Rey G, DJ Saoko, DJ Hernan + more

    All Ages! 2 Full Bars (21+), Appetizers
    Dress Code: Casual to Sexy
    No partner needed!

    See you Friday!

 

WHERE TO MEET US:

Bryn will be at the door greeting folks from 9:15-11pm. There will be a Meetup 'corner' so folks have a place to hang out and meet each other.
item.how_to_find_us: Bryn will be at the door greeting folks from 9:15-11pm. There will be a Meetup 'corner' so folks have a place to hang out and meet each other.

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: Live Music night at Enigma Salsa & Bachata Club, Harvard Square
